content: I do not have access to current updates and information of boston college. however, boston college provides various fitness facilities and resources for its students, including state-of-the-art fitness centers, group fitness classes, intramural sports programs, and outdoor recreational opportunities. the main fitness center is the flynn recreation complex, which features a cardio and weight training area, indoor pool, basketball and volleyball courts, a climbing wall, and more. the margot connell recreation center is another fitness facility on campus. group fitness classes include yoga, kickboxing, and cycling. intramural sports programs include basketball, flag football, and frisbee. outdoor recreational opportunities include hiking and skiing. boston college also offers personal training and wellness services to help students achieve their fitness goals.
